question: The term “Alliance 8.7” that was recently making news, is associated to which of the following?
option1: Development of Artificial Intelligence and Block Chain Technologies
option2: Implement effective measures to end forced labour
option3: Draft resolution on the status of Jerusalem
option4: An intergovernmental counter-terrorist alliance of countries in the Muslim World
answer: Implement effective measures to end forced labour
explanation: Alliance 8.7 is for a world without forced labour, modern slavery, human trafficking and child labour. It is an initiative under the United Nations’ 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. It calls for effective measures to end forced labour, modern slavery, and human trafficking, as well as child labour in all its forms.
